text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Committees formed in Tikrit, the birthplace of President Saddam Hussein, to mark his birthday celebrations scheduled for Aparil 28.
- Iranian exile leader in Iraq says 80 per cent of Iranians live below poverty level.
- Peace activists from Belgium visit Baghdad.
- Lebanese writer lauds Saddam's attitude towards Lebanon.
- Iraq to take part in a regional conference on air surveillance.
- (The above were also carried by AL-IRAQ and JUMHOURIYA)
- U.N. resolutions on Iraq are a call for genocide.
- Campaign to refurbish the holy city of Karbala
